ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_tvclmod | |- ( W e. TopVec -> W e. LMod ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_tvctdrg | |- ( W e. TopVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. TopDRing ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tdrgdrng | |- ( ( Scalar ` W ) e. TopDRing -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. TopVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_islvec | |- ( W e. LVec <-> ( W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( W e. TopVec -> W e. LVec ) |
